title.native: 範馬刃牙VSケンガンアシュラ

description:
Who will be crowned victorious in the ultimate fight between the strongest high schooler on earth and the successor of the Niko Style?

(Source: Netflix Anime)
hashtag: #範馬刃牙VSケンガンアシュラ #BakiKengan
synonyms: ฮันมะ บากิปะทะกำปั้นอสูร โทคิตะ

tags.name: Crossover
tags.description: Centers around the placement of two or more otherwise discrete fictional characters, settings, or universes into the context of a single story.

tags.name: Martial Arts
tags.description: Centers around the use of traditional hand-to-hand combat.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Office Lady

tags.name: Delinquents
tags.description: Features characters with a notorious image and attitude, sometimes referred to as "yankees".

title.native: ケンガンアシュラ
範馬刃牙
ケンガンアシュラ
範馬刃牙

node.description:
Keisuke Itagaki is a Japanese manga artist. He is best known for his martial arts series [Grappler Baki](https://anilist.co/manga/41425/Grappler-Baki/) (1991–1999) and its five sequels, which have sold over 100 million volumes. In 1996, he began working on [Garouden](https://anilist.co/manga/37921/Garouden/), an original work by [Baku Yumemakura](https://anilist.co/staff/97026/Baku-Yumemakura). He has also collaborated on the series [Garouden Boy](https://anilist.co/manga/45998/Garouden-Boy/).

Prior to becoming a manga artist, he served 5 years in the 1st Airborne Brigade of the Japan Ground Self-Defense Force. During his service, he practiced amateur boxing and has competed in the National Sports Festival. He also holds a degree in Shorinji Kempo, which he has practiced since he was a teenager. 

He is the father of the famous mangaka [Paru Itagaki](https://anilist.co/staff/121564/).

name.native: サンドロビッチ・ヤバ子

node.description:
__[Website](https://leaders.asobisystem.com/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/japanleaders)__ | __[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/japanleaders/)__ | __[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/japan_leaders/)__

__Formed:__ 2015

__Introduction:__
Atarashii Gakkou no Leaders, internationally known as Atarashii Gakko!, is a four-piece, all-female Japanese dance and vocal performance group, signed to 88rising.

__Biography:__
They began in 2015 with a remix of the song "Kamu to Funyan" (噛むとフニャン), and released in 2016 their first original song "Gakkou Ikeya" (学校行けやあ゛). In 2017, they signed with the label Victor Entertainment, and released their second song, "Dokubana" (毒花), which made them known, peaking at the top 84 in the Oricon. In 2018, they released their first album "Maenarawanai" (マエナラワナイ), and in 2019 their second album "Wakage ga Itaru" (若気ガイタル).
In 2020, they signed with the american label 88rising and became internationally know as "Atarashii Gakko!".
Their goal is to embody the new generation of japanese youth.

__Members:__
• Kanazawa Suzuka (金沢涼花), better known as simply SUZUKA – lead vocals and dance (2015–)
• Ishii Mizuki (石井美月), better known as MIZYU – occasional lead vocals, backing vocals and dance (2015–)
• Kimura Kanon (木村カノン), better known as simply KANON – backing vocals and dance (2015–)
• Nagasawa Rin (長澤凛), better known as simply RIN – backing vocals and dance (2015–)
Dubbing director and translator at Iyuno Poland.

[Website](https://lead-fc.jp/) | [Twitter](https://mobile.twitter.com/Lead_tv) Lead is a Japanese hip-hop dance and vocal group, initially formed under the name Rhymix in Osaka, Japan in March 2002. They went through two name changes before debuting as "Lead" in May 2002 under the Pony Canyon sub-label Flight Master. The group consists of Shinya Taniuichi, Keita Furuya, Akira Kagimoto and, formerly, Hiroki Nakadoi.

(Source: Wikipedia)

Affiliated with **Mouse**.

*Note: Not to be confused with the [production manager](https://anilist.co/staff/275308) of the same name.*
